group_1.textRight: Rise and shine.

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:1.0][chara:103701:lipSynch_1]Good morning, Rabi.

group_1.textRight: Good morning. Did you sleep well?

group_1.textLeft: I had a restless night.

group_1.textRight: That won't do. I'll make you an energizing@breakfast.
...Something's on your mind. Is it related to@why you couldn't sleep?
You've been like this since you came home@yesterday.
If you keep this up, you'll get wrinkles on@your face.

group_1.textLeft: I can't help it.
I inadvertently thought of Touka the other day...

group_1.textRight: So that's what's going on...
Lady Touka is a major source of stress to you,@isn't she?

group_1.textLeft: Indeed. Worse still, the more I try not thinking@about her, the more she springs to mind...!

group_1.textRight: It's quite early. Is it one of our neighbors?
...No, it's Mikage.

group_1.textLeft: It's highly unusual for her to ring the doorbell.

group_1.textRight: Please, come inside.

group_1.textLeft: Looks like I've got another sourpuss to manage.

group_1.textRight: Even I get mad now and then.
And this time, it's all Sutan's fault!

group_1.textLeft: What in the world happened, Mikage?

group_1.textRight: Mm...
Me and Sutan have been fighting since@yesterday.
It all started when we were hanging out@in the park...
...Hey, Mii, did you hear what I just said?

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:1.0][chara:103801:eyeClose_0][chara:103801:cheek_0][chara:103801:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:103801:lipSynch_1]Huh?!
Oh...sorry, I kinda dozed off for a sec...

group_1.textRight: Really? Are you tired?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... We had gym in fifth period today, and@math right after...I'm totally wiped.
And I have lots and lots of homework to do,@and I also need to fight a Witch...
I'm so tired I'm gonna diiie...
Life would be so much easier if there@wasn't any school.

group_1.textRight: I'm...a little jealous...that you get to go@to school.
I want to go back, but I can't...

group_1.textLeft: Seriously?
I mean...I don't have a lot of friends at@school, so it's boring...
No one gets mad at you for skipping school.@It makes me jealous.

group_1.textRight: No way! I'm the one who's jealous!

group_1.textLeft: Nuh-uh! I am!

group_1.textRight: Mii!

group_1.textLeft: Sutan!

group_1.textRight: And then we started fighting.
We got really into it when we suddenly remembered@the next Terrapichi issue came out that day.
We stopped fighting and went to go buy it@together,
but then we started fighting over who would@get to read it first,
and then we went to the 100-yen store, andâ€“!
Anyway, Sutan is wrong!

group_1.textLeft: ...Given how emotional you were, I lost track@of what was happening about halfway through,
but from what I could tell, you are both at least@far more kind than Touka.
She would come up with a science problem@out of nowhere,
and while I was scrambling to make@sense of it,
she'd snicker to herself and mock and agitate me,@and finish it all off by attacking my personality!
I could hardly sleep last night because I kept@remembering these incidents.

group_1.textRight: I see...
...Wait, what am I saying?!
Why am I listening to YOU complaining all@of a sudden?!
I'm the one who's supposed to be doing that!

group_1.textLeft: I want to complain as well!
I'm fed up with just listening to you@all the time!

group_1.textRight: Excuse me?!

group_1.textCenter: Here you go, you two. Your pudding is ready.

group_1.textRight: Yay! Let's dig in!

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh* How I wish my problems could be@so easily resolved with pudding.
